statements: SELECT * FROM energy_consumption_data
SELECT household_id, energy_usage FROM energy_consumption_data ORDER BY energy_usage DESC
SELECT * FROM energy_consumption_data WHERE household_id = 3
SELECT AVG(energy_usage) AS avg_energy_usage FROM energy_consumption_data
SELECT * FROM energy_consumption_data ORDER BY timestamp ASC, energy_usage DESC
SELECT * FROM energy_consumption_data WHERE energy_usage > 100 ORDER BY timestamp DESC
SELECT household_id, timestamp FROM energy_consumption_data WHERE household_id = 3
SELECT MAX(energy_usage) AS max_usage FROM energy_consumption_data
SELECT AVG(energy_usage) AS avg_usage, DATE(timestamp) AS date FROM energy_consumption_data GROUP BY DATE(timestamp)
SELECT * FROM energy_consumption_data WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31'
SELECT * FROM energy_consumption_data;
SELECT household_id, energy_usage FROM energy_consumption_data;
SELECT household_id, timestamp, energy_usage FROM energy_consumption_data ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT household_id, address, family_size FROM household_info;
SELECT household_id, address FROM household_info WHERE family_size > 3;
SELECT * FROM energy_consumption_data ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT household_id, energy_usage FROM energy_consumption_data WHERE energy_usage > 100 ORDER BY energy_usage ASC
SELECT household_id, address, family_size FROM household_info WHERE family_size = 4 AND address LIKE '%Street%'
SELECT e.timestamp, e.energy_usage, h.address FROM energy_consumption_data e JOIN household_info h ON e.household_id = h.household_id WHERE e.energy_usage < 50
SELECT * FROM household_info ORDER BY family_size DESC, household_id ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM energy_consumption_data
SELECT household_id, energy_usage, date, time FROM energy_consumption_data ORDER BY household_id ASC
SELECT * FROM household_location WHERE city = 'Los Angeles'
SELECT household_id, address, state FROM household_location WHERE state = 'CA' ORDER BY household_id DESC
SELECT household_id, pattern_type FROM energy_consumption_patterns
SELECT * FROM energy_consumption_data ORDER BY date ASC, time DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT household_id, energy_usage FROM energy_consumption_data WHERE household_id = 1001 OR household_id = 1003;
SELECT pattern_type, pattern_description FROM energy_consumption_patterns WHERE household_id = 1001 AND pattern_type = 'weekly';
SELECT energy_usage FROM energy_consumption_data WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30' ORDER BY energy_usage DESC;
SELECT ed.household_id, ed.energy_usage, hl.city FROM energy_consumption_data ed JOIN household_location hl ON ed.household_id = hl.household_id WHERE ed.energy_usage > 1000;
SELECT * FROM households;
SELECT location, energy_provider FROM households WHERE household_id = 1;
SELECT reading_date, reading_value FROM energy_readings WHERE household_id = 2 ORDER BY reading_date DESC;
SELECT household_id, pattern_description FROM usage_patterns WHERE household_id = 3 LIMIT 5;
SELECT household_id, optimization_strategy FROM usage_optimization WHERE household_id = 4 ORDER BY optimization_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM households ORDER BY household_id DESC;
SELECT household_id, location FROM households WHERE energy_provider='Solar Energy';
SELECT reading_id, household_id, MAX(reading_value) AS max_reading FROM energy_readings GROUP BY household_id;
SELECT pattern_description FROM usage_patterns WHERE household_id=3;
SELECT household_id, optimization_strategy FROM usage_optimization WHERE optimization_id IN (1, 3, 5) ORDER BY household_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM HouseholdDetails
SELECT household_id, address, owner FROM HouseholdDetails WHERE family_size > 4
SELECT energy_usage, date, time FROM EnergyConsumption ORDER BY date DESC, time ASC
SELECT pattern_name, start_time, end_time FROM EnergyPatterns WHERE start_time < '12:00:00'
SELECT household_id, average_usage, peak_usage, off_peak_usage FROM HouseholdStats
SELECT household_id, date, energy_usage FROM EnergyConsumption WHERE energy_usage > 50 ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT household_id, owner, family_size FROM HouseholdDetails WHERE family_size >= 4 ORDER BY household_id ASC
SELECT pattern_id, pattern_name, start_time, end_time FROM EnergyPatterns WHERE start_time < '12:00:00' AND end_time > '20:00:00'
SELECT optimization_id, strategy, efficiency_rating FROM UsageOptimization WHERE efficiency_rating > 0.8 ORDER BY efficiency_rating DESC
SELECT household_id, average_usage, peak_usage, off_peak_usage FROM HouseholdStats WHERE peak_usage > 100 ORDER BY household_id ASC
